# 공공데이터
현황 ## 공공데이터 포털 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'tibble' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'dplyr' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── ✔ dplyr 1.1.2 ✔ readr 2.1.4 ✔ forcats 1.0.0 ✔ stringr 1.5.0 ✔ ggplot2 3.4.2 ✔ tibble 3.2.1 ✔ lubridate 1.9.2 ✔ tidyr 1.3.0 ✔ purrr 1.0.1 ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ℹ Use the conflicted package () to force all conflicts to become errors ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(readxl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'readxl' was built under R version 4.2.3 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(reactable) public_dat <- readxl::read_excel(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/public-data.xlsx"), sheet = "현황") public_dat %>% janitor::clean_names(ascii = FALSE) %>% reactable::reactable(defaultPageSize = 10, columns = list( 포털명 = colDef(minWidth = 200))) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: aside - [김학래, "2022 데이터 인사이트 세미나", 중앙대학교 HIKE 연구실](https://forum.datahub.kr/t/topic/128) ::: ## 공공데이터 자료 제공 형식 {.smaller} ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(readxl) library(reactable) public_dat_type <- readxl::read_excel(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/public-data.xlsx"), sheet = "서비스유형") public_dat_type %>% janitor::clean_names(ascii = FALSE) %>% reactable::reactable(defaultPageSize = 10, columns = list( 포털_목록 = colDef(minWidth = 60))) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: aside - [김학래, "2022 데이터 인사이트 세미나", 중앙대학교 HIKE 연구실](https://forum.datahub.kr/t/topic/128) ::: ## 공공데이터 정해진 미래(?) ![](img/public/hike-data-insight.jpg) ::: aside - [김학래, "2022 데이터 인사이트 세미나", 중앙대학교 HIKE 연구실](https://forum.datahub.kr/t/topic/128) :::
